Params: {1: '1', 3: 'Standing on the stage, Kemuri bows to the audience.'}
{2: 'Drawn-Out Voice', 3: 'All merchandise have been individually displayed.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Drawn-Out Voice', 3: 'All merchandise, please step on the stage for a group display.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'All attention is drawn to two feminine figures on the elevated platform.'}
{3: 'An archaic duality of beauty emblazons the stage. One of an eastward demureness, and one of a westward elegance.'}
{2: 'Golden-Haired Woman', 3: "What are y'all doing here? Did you receive the same mission too?"}
{2: "What's wrong, Lee?", 3: '18', 4: "Lee, you don't look very well.", 5: '18'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Must be a glitch with my visual module.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'We have to find a way to get to her.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Looking around, you see some mechanical puppets that were snaking through the audience fall silent. Then a familiar figure bursts into view.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'As if noticing your gaze, Chrome glances your way, then his face twitches and he lowers his head.'}
{3: 'The pretty golden-haired woman on the stage looks over to you synchronously, as if alerted by some signal.'}
{3: 'The gentle, twinkling pair of eyes curve into familiar slits... "She" parts her lips, and mouths an all-too familiar word.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'A masked Construct, a paper umbrella in hand, gently lifts the bamboo curtain—the legendary leader finally emerges from backstage.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "Commandant of Gray Raven, this is Chrome of Strike Hawk. I'm contacting you through a special channel.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Since we can't stay connected for long, I'll keep it short. Our team will work with Gray Raven to cause a distraction so Lucia can approach the target...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The moment the call disconnects, a familiar figure leaps out of the audience.'}
{3: 'Kamui, somehow, has already whipped out his gear from some unfathomable place. His ornate hat falls to the ground.'}
{3: "Chrome's scythe catches the eaves of a corridor, and he pulls himself up in the air."}
{3: "Two figures, one blue and one red, pass by each other in mid-air. Lucia and Chrome's weapons meet."}
{3: 'With a boost from Chrome, Lucia vaults onto the platform and grabs Lady Qu by her arm.'}
